tslint.description: Replaces TSLint Settings with Rangle preferred TSLint and Prettier Settings

feature.description: Create an entire feature module, complete with module, routes, root component, service, state interface and ngrx infrastructure

module.description: Create a module for a feature

routes.description: Create a routing module for a feature

type.description: Create the type with interface and functions files

ngrx.description: Create all @ngrx files for a feature

ngrx-store.description: Create an @ngrx store service for a feature

ngrx-actions.description: Create an @ngrx actions file for a feature

ngrx-reducer.description: Create an @ngrx reducer function for a feature

ngrx-effects.description: Create an @ngrx effects service for a feature
